channel.title: Npc walk
channel.description:
Hello there. i am wondering how i can let my npc's walk.
code -> [code]spawn = 0 3221 3220 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hans[/code]
ty

item.title: Npc walk
item.dc:creator: @s3v3r3ds0ul s3v3r3ds0ul
item.description:
@s3v3r3ds0ul wrote:

[quote=“plompke, post:1, topic:347569”]Hello there. i am wondering how i can let my npc’s walk.

code ->

spawn = 0	3221	3220	0	0	0	0	0	1	Hans

ty[/quote]

The last four zero’s in the code : spawn = 0 3221 3220 0 (0 0 0 0) 1 Hans
are the coords between which your NPC can walk. So to allow it to walk 1 square change your code to something like this:

spawn = 0	3221	3220	0	3222      3221	3220      3219      1	Hans

Read full topic
